alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 9:30PM PST until March 01 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying farm land and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM PST Monday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 15.1 feet. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight into early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM PST.
